author: Staff Reporter
text:
The decomposed body of Saranya, 21, the young woman who went missing from her home in Villivakkam on December 9, was recovered from a house in Sholavaram on Monday.

Her parents had lodged a complaint after she went missing. Meanwhile, her neighbour, Manoharan (28), reported to be close to her, committed suicide at a lodge in Jolarpettai the next day. Police broke into a house in sun city in Sholavaram after residents complained of a foul smell emanating from it. Post mortem established that it was Saranya’s.
title: Missing woman’s body found in Sholavaram
